maqras.text: Jiss aayat ko hum mansookh ker den ya bhula den iss say behtar ya iss jaisi aur latay hain kiya tu nahi janta kay Allah Taalaa her cheez per qadir hai
Kiya tujhay nahi maloom kay zamin-o-aasman ka mulk Allah hi kay liye hai aur Allah kay siwa tumhara koi wali aur madadgar nahi
Kiya tum apney rasool say yehi poochna chahatay ho jo iss say pehlay musa (alh-e-salam) poocha gaya tha? (suno) eman ko kufur say badalney wala seedhi raah say bhatak jata hai

Inn ehal-e-kitab kay aksay log ba wajood haq wazeh ho janey kay mehaz hasad-o-bughz ki bina per tumhen bhi eman say hata dena chahatay hain tum bhi moad kero aur choro yahan tak kay Allah Taalaa apna hukum laye. Yaqeenan Allah Taalaa her cheez per qudrat rakhta hai
Tum namazen qaeem rakho aur zakat detay raha kero aur jo kuch bhalaee tum apney liye aagay bhejo gay sab kuch Allah kay pass paa lo gay be-shak Allah Taalaa tumharay aemaalon ko khoob dekh raha hai
Yeh kehtay hain kay jannat mein yahud-o-nasaaraa kay siwa aur koi na jayega yeh sirf inn ki aarzooyen hain inn say kaho agar tum sachay ho to koi daleel to paish kero
Suno! Jo bhi apney aap ko khuloos kay sath Allah kay samney jhuka dey. Be-shak ussay uss ka rab poora badla dey ga iss per na to koi khof hoga na ghum aur udasi

Yahud kehtay hain kay nasrani haq per nahi aur nasrani kehtay hain kay yahudi haq per nahi halankay yeh sab log toraat parhtay hain issi tarah inn hi jaisi baat bey ilm bhi kehtay hain. Qayamat kay din Allah inn kay iss ikhtilaf ka faisla inn kay darmiyan ker dey ga

Uss shaks say barh ker zalim kaun hai jo Allah Taalaa ki masjidon mein Allah Taalaa kay zikar kiye janey ko rokay aur unn ki barbadi ki kosish keray aisay logon ko khof khatay huye hi iss mein jana chahaiye inn kay liye duniya mein bhi ruswaee hai aur aakhirat mein bhi bara azab hai
Aur mashriq aur maghrib ka maalik Allah hi hai. Tum jidhar bhi mun kero udhar hi Allah ka mun hai Allah Taalaa kushadgi aur wusat wala aur baray ilm wala hai
Yeh kehtay hain kay Allah Taalaa ki aulad hai (nahi bulkay) woh pak hai zamin-o-aasman ki tamam makhlooq uss ki milkiyat mein hai aur her aik uss ka farmanbardar hai
Woh zamin aur aasmanon ka ibtidaâ€™an peda kerney wala hai woh jiss kaam ko kerna chahye keh deta hai kay hoja bus woh wahin hojata hai

Issi tarah bey ilm logon ney bhi kaha kay khud Allah Taalaa hum say baaten kiyon nahi kerta ya humaray pass koi nishani kiyon nahi aati? Issi tarah aisi hi baat inn kay aglon ney bhi kahi thi unn kay aur inn kay dil yaksan hogaye. Hum ney to yaqeen kerney walon kay liye nishaniyan biyan ker den
Hum ney aap ko haq kay sath khushkhabri denay wala aur daraney wala bana ker bheja hai aur jahannumiyon kay baray mein aap say pursish nahi hogi

Aap say yahud-o-nasaaraa hergiz razi nahi hongay jab tak kay aap inn kay mazaahib kay tabey na bann jayen aap keh dijiye kay Allah ki hidayat hi hidayat hai aur agar aap ney apney pass ba wajood ilm aajaney kay phir inn ki khuwaishon ki pairwee ki to Allah kay pass aap ka na to koi wali hoga aur na madadgar
Jinhen hum ney kitab di hai aur woh issay parhney kay haq kay sath parhtay hain woh iss kitab per bhi eman rakhtay hain aur jo iss kay sath kufur keray woh nuksan wala hai
Aey aulad-e-yaqoob! Mein ney jo nematen tum per inam ki hain unhen yaad kero aur mein to tumhen tamam jahanon per fazilat dey rakhi thi
Uss din say daro jiss din koi nafss kissi nafss ko kuch faeeda na phoncha sakay ga na kissi shaks say koi fidya qabool kiya jayega na ussay koi shifaat nafa dey gi na unn ki madad ki jayegi
